DOC.brief_summary: In this randomized controlled trial the utility of capnography and IPI gets evaluated. Hypoxemia may occur during sedation with midazolam and propofol. Whether hypoxemia may be prevented by an additional capnographic monitoring is subject of the study.
DOC.criteria: Age>=18 Scheduled for interventional upper GI endoscopy with midazolam and propofol sedation No informed consent ASA IV or V Emergency endoscopy Preexisting hypotension, bradycardia or hypoxemia
